mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM user_tbl WHERE user_level = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS rNum, u.* FROM ( SELECT user_no AS userNo, user_id AS userId, user_pw AS userPw, user_name AS userName, user_phone AS userPhone, user_level AS userLevel, user_birth AS userBirth, user_date AS userDate, user_gender AS userGender, user_addr AS userAddr, user_point AS userPoint FROM user_tbl WHERE user_level = 1 )u) WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
